description: This Java source file defines the PriceScheduler class, which is responsible for scheduling periodic execution of the PriceTrackingService's runAll method, based on a cron expression specified via environment configuration.

classes.name: PriceScheduler
classes.description: A Spring configuration class that enables scheduling and defines a scheduled task to trigger price tracking periodically.

methods.name: PriceScheduler
methods.description: Constructor that injects the PriceTrackingService dependency.

methods.name: scheduledRun
methods.description: Method scheduled to run at intervals defined by the cron expression; calls runAll() on the PriceTrackingService.
